item.title: Dune Awakening: How to Get Spice-Infused Copper Dust
item.description:
Spice-Infused Copper Dust is a rare crafting material required to fabricate unique weapons, armors, and tools in Dune: Awakening . Players can only find this material in a very few chests across the map.

Unlike a lot of other materials in the game, Spice-Infused Copper Dust’s spawns are not random; all of its locations are fixed, which means you need to know where to look to find it. For players hoping to craft a full set of Unique gear for their build, obtaining a lot of this valuable crafting resource should be first on the agenda.

Where to Find Spice-Infused Copper Dust in Dune: Awakening

In Dune: Awakening , Spice-Infused Copper Dust can typically be found in special super-large chests that also contain Unique Schematics. Not all Unique Schematic chests contain this material; it can only be found inside a select few. In Hagga Basin South, there are three chests that spawn Spice-Infused Copper Dust.

  • Wreck of the Alcyon: East of the Griffin’s Reach Trading Post. Contains the Kaleff’s Drinker Unique Dagger Schematic
  • Imperial Testing Station No. 2: Between Griffin’s Reach Trading Post and the Wreck of the Alcyon. Contains The Emperor’s Wings Mk1 Unique Utility Schematic.
  • Old Griffin Hideaway: Just west of the Griffin outpost, hidden among the cliffs. Contains Way of the Fallen Unique Gun Schematic.

Once you find Spice-Infused Copper Dust, mark its location. After a period of time (roughly 45 minutes), the contents of this chest will respawn, which includes not only the Spice-Infused Copper Dust but also the Unique Schematic. Make sure to occasionally make return trips for these chests to obtain a surplus of these valuable resources.

A Sandbike is crucial to make traversal between locations easier.

How to Use Spice-Infused Copper Dust in Dune: Awakening

Spice-Infused Copper Dust is a crafting ingredient needed to make Uniques at a Fabricator in the player’s base with the corresponding Imperial Permit. After you’ve obtained a Unique Schematic for an item, return to the base and Research it (from the inventory). Then, use a Fabricator to craft the Unique item with the obtained Imperial Permit.

You do not need to carry Spice-Infused Copper Dust in your inventory for the Fabricator to detect it. As long as the item is one of the storage containers inside your base, it will be recognized.

Unique Schematics and Imperial Permits are one-time-use items, which means once you use them, they’ll be destroyed. In order to craft another one of the Uniques, you’ll need to obtain another Unique Schematic from the super-large chest and redo the process from the start.

item.title: Rumor: Xbox Working With Disney On a New Star Wars Game
item.description:
Summary

  • Disney may be partnering with Xbox for new Star Wars game.
  • This comes after the incredible success of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.
  • It's unclear which Xbox studio will be developing the title.

Disney may be partnering with Xbox once more to make a new Star Wars game, according to a new rumor. This wouldn't be the first time Xbox and Disney have partnered up, as they recently came together to create Indiana Jones and the Great Circle developed by Bethesda's Wolfenstein studio, MachineGames. The game was released back in December to massive critical acclaim and became one of the first major Xbox first-party titles to jump over to PlayStation 5 this past April. That's not all, however, as another Bethesda team, Arkane Lyon, still has its Marvel's Blade game in development.

Ever since EA's Star Wars exclusivity ended two years ago, there has been a new wave of exciting new titles based on the iconic sci-fi franchise. Perhaps the biggest of them all is Ubisoft's 2024 entry, Star Wars Outlaws , hailed as the first ever open-world Star Wars game. There have also been a number of lower-profile remasters of classic Star Wars games, like Nightdive Studios' Star Wars: Dark Forces Remaster and Aspyr's Star Wars: Bounty Hunter and Star Wars Episode 1: Jedi Power Battles . There are even more games currently in the works, too, such as EA's third Star Wars Jedi entry, Quantic Dream's mysterious Star Wars Eclipse , Aspyr's Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic remake, and the most recently announced Star Wars Zero Company , an XCOM -like tactics game from Bit Reactor.

Now, a new rumor suggests that another new Star Wars game could be in the works, this time under the Xbox banner. According to Xbox influencer Riskit4TB on Twitter, Disney is reportedly interested in working with Xbox once more after the critical and commercial success of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle . Riskit goes on to mention that his contact believes it's a new Star Wars game that Disney is apparently interested in making with Xbox.

Disney Might Be Working on New Star Wars Game with Xbox

This new rumor poses the interesting question of which studio under the Xbox umbrella would be in the best position to make a Star Wars game. After Indiana Jones and the Great Circle , MachineGames is expected by many to return to its Wolfenstein series for a third mainline installment, as it's now been eight years since 2017's Wolfenstein 2 . There have been short-lived rumors of a Coalition Mandalorian game in the past, though with Gears of War: E-Day next up for the studio, this no longer seems likely. Ninja Theory, id Software, Zenimax Online and the freshly created Elsewhere Entertainment have yet to announce their next big games, making them prime suspects for a Star Wars production.

Although the Xbox Games Showcase is set to go live this Sunday, June 8, fans shouldn't expect any Disney or Star Wars news to come of it, as if this rumor is true, the game is potentially several years away. Though that's not to rule out a new look at Marvel's Blade , as Sunday seems like a prime opportunity for Arkane Lyon to take a piece of the Xbox spotlight.

item.title: Roblox: Dress to Impress Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dress to Impress Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Dress to Impress

Dress to Impress is a beautifully designed game on the Roblox platform where you can express yourself and even compete with other players to see who is more creative and inventive. The main goal is to create a unique, garish, and impressive look for a fashion model to win the competition.

There are plenty of clothes and accessories that you can choose from to create an image, and you can even choose hair and makeup for the model separately. By redeeming Dress to Impress codes, you will receive unique clothes and accessories that you can put on the model and make her stand out from the crowd.

Updated June 6, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Dress to Impress features a wide selection of active codes that unlock various cosmetic rewards like outfits, accessories, and themed items. These additions let you customize your look with more flair and variety. Keep checking back regularly, as more customization options might be added soon.

All Dress to Impress Codes

Although the game has quite a lot of clothes and accessories that you can use for your model outfit, sometimes something is missing, and having a few exclusive items will be a great advantage. Fortunately, the game developers generously reward fans with such bonuses, and you can also get them by redeeming Dress to Impress codes. New codes appear occasionally, but their validity is limited, so be sure to redeem them as soon as possible.

Working Dress to Impress Codes

﻿

  • 3NCHANTEDD1ZZY - Redeem this code to get Rewards. (NEW)
  • ELLA - Redeem this code to get Clothes.
  • 1CON1CF4TMA - Redeem this code to get Clothes.
  • B3APL4YS_D0L1E - Redeem this code to get a Doll.
  • MEGANPLAYSBOOTS - Redeem this code to get Boots.
  • CH00P1E_1S_B4CK - Redeem this code to get a Jacket, Skirt and Shoes.
  • D1ORST4R - Redeem this code to get a Bag.
  • S3M_0W3N_Y4Y - Redeem this code to get an Axe.
  • UMOYAE - Redeem this code to get a Dress.
  • BELALASLAY - Redeem this code to get a Jacket.
  • KITTYUUHH - Redeem this code to get Caseoh’s cat.
  • KREEK - Redeem this code to get a Hat.
  • LANATUTU - Redeem this code to get a dress.
  • ITSJUSTNICHOLAS - Redeem this code to get a black jacket.
  • M3RM4ID - Redeem this code to get a mermaid tail and skin.
  • C4LLMEHH4LEY - Redeem this code to get a dress and hat with ears.
  • IBELLASLAY - Redeem this code to get hair.
  • ASHLEYBUNNI - Redeem this code to get bunny slippers.
  • SUBM15CY - Redeem this code to get neckless and eyelashes.
  • LANA - Redeem this code to get top, shorts, and leg warmers.
  • TEKKYOOZ - Redeem this code to get the purse.
  • LANABOW - Redeem this code to get a bow.
  • LABOOTS - Redeem this code to get boots.
  • LEAHASHE - Redeem this code to get a sweatshirt and sweatpants.

Expired Dress to Impress Codes

  • FASHION
  • CUPIDSCLOUD
  • M0T0PRINCESSWAV
  • SWEETHEART
  • NY2025
  • 4BILLION
  • WINTERUPDATE
  • CHOOPIE10K
  • THEGAMES
  • REWARD4CLASS1C
  • DOLLISTA
  • DOLLISTAGRAM
  • CHERRY
  • VALENTINESDAY

How to Redeem Codes for Dress to Impress

Fortunately, redeeming Dress to Impress codes is not difficult and will take you a few seconds. There's no tutorial that will limit your access to redeeming codes, so you can do it as soon as you enter the game. If you have never redeemed a Dress to Impress code before, here's how to do it:

  • Launch Dress to Impress .
  • When you're in the lobby, look to the left side of the screen, you will see several interactive buttons.
  • Among them, find and click on the lowest one, an icon with three asterisks.
  • This will open the menu for redeeming codes, where you will see an input field and a button with a checkmark icon.
  • Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the active codes into the input field. All letters must be capitalized; otherwise, the system will consider the code invalid.
  • Once you have entered the code in the input field, click on the button with the checkmark icon to submit the reward request.
  • If everything is successful, a notification about the item or accessory you received, and its icon will appear in the middle of the screen.

If you want to wear the accessories or clothing you received by redeeming codes, you will need to go to the redemption tab, where all the items you obtained will be displayed.

item.title: Roblox: DRIVE Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
DRIVE is an exceptional roguelike horror game that, among other Roblox experiences, will definitely impress you and evoke vivid emotions. Here, solo or in co-op, you'll need to survive in a gloomy world, avoiding scary monsters and repairing your car because it's the only thing that can keep you alive.

To have a great boost at the beginning or a nice bonus if you are an experienced player, you can redeem DRIVE codes. Each code offers useful rewards, such as Parts, local currency, or Revives, which will definitely come in handy in your endless adventures.

Updated June 6, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: DRIVE currently offers a couple of active codes that give you Parts and Revives. These rewards can help you stay on the road longer and make upgrades a bit easier. They're easy to claim and can be useful if you're looking for a quick boost. Be sure to check back soon in case more options are added.

All DRIVE Codes

Working DRIVE Codes

  • FunWithFamily - Redeem this code to get 200 Parts and 1 Revives.
  • HappyCamper - Redeem this code to get 100 Parts and 2 Revives.

Expired DRIVE Codes

  • FirstCode - Redeem this code to get 100 Parts and 2 Revives.

Considering how difficult and scary it is to survive in the dark lands of the DRIVE world, things like Parts and Revives will definitely come in handy. Instead of wasting several hours of play, you can get them quickly and easily by redeeming DRIVE codes, so hurry up.

How to Redeem Codes for DRIVE

DRIVE 's redemption system is not complicated, and the same is often found in other Roblox games. You can do it as soon as you enter the game, so if you're ready, here are the instructions on how to redeem DRIVE codes:

  • Launch DRIVE .
  • Pay attention to the upper left part of the screen, there will be several buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the last one, which says Codes and a tweeter icon.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Submit button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Submit button to submit your reward request.

If you have followed the instructions correctly and the codes are working, you will see a notification of successful redemption below the redemption menu and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More DRIVE Codes

Similar to most other Roblox experiences, you can find codes for DRIVE on various official social media pages. Namely, you can find them by visiting the official Roblox group or on the official Discord server of the game in the announcements tab.

item.title: New Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Mystery Gift Codes Will Be Distributed This Month, Here's When
item.description:
Summary

  • Porygon2 will be available in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet via Mystery Gift Code on June 7 and 8.
  • Flutter Mane will be available in a separate code event starting June 21, modeled after the one used by the 2024 Pokemon Japan Champion.
  • Flutter Mane is a Ghost and Fairy dual-type Pokemon with high special attack and speed, perfect for sweeping.

Throughout June, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players can claim two new creatures via Mystery Gift Codes that will be distributed during live events. Alongside a Porygon2 distribution set to begin on June 7 and 8, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet will also give away Flutter Mane a few weeks later via a separate code event.

Both the Porygon2 and Flutter Mane distribution events will be the first giveaways in a new era for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet . On June 5, the Nintendo Switch 2 hit store shelves globally, and the ninth generation of Pokemon games received a significant performance upgrade as part of the launch. By taking advantage of the Switch 2's upgraded hardware, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet now run at up to 60 FPS on the new system, including in areas that previously struggled to maintain a stable frame rate. The free Switch 2 update for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet is included with the games' new version 4.0.0 update, which is necessary for online play.

Throughout June, Pokemon Scarlet and Viole t players will have two chances to add some new critters to their growing collections. Starting June 7 and 8, Porygon2 will be distributed via a Mystery Gift Code that will be revealed during the 2025 Pokemon Trainers Cup in South Korea. Two weeks later, as reported by ComicBook, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players can claim a Flutter Mane via a separate code event. The Flutter Mane Mystery Gift Code will be shown off during the 2025 Pokemon Japan Championships on June 21 and 22. This special Flutter Mane is modeled after the one used by the 2024 Pokemon Japan Champion, Hyuma Hara. The moves that the distributed Flutter Mane will have are Moonblast, Icy Wind, Taunt, and Trick Room. Flutter Mane will also hold a Booster Energy, which activates its Protosynthesis ability at the start of the battle to increase its power.

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet June 2025 Mystery Gift Details

  • Starting June 7 and 8, Porygon2 will be available via a Mystery Gift Code event.
  • The code will be revealed during the 2025 Pokemon Trainers Cup.
  • Flutter Mane will have a distribution starting June 21 and 22 during the 2025 Japan Championships.
  • The Paradox Pokemon will be modeled after the one used by Hyuma Hara, the 2024 Japan Champion.

As one of the Paradox Pokemon introduced in the ninth generation, Flutter Mane is a Ghost and Fairy dual-type creature exclusive to Pokemon Scarlet . Flutter Mane is considered a prehistoric variant of Misdreavus, and its strongest statistics are its special attack and speed. In short, Flutter Mane has carved a niche as one of the best sweeper options in ranked battles.

Between the Mystery Gift distributions and the ongoing Porygon2 Mass Outbreak and Tera Raid events, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players have some new ways to grow their collections. It remains to be seen what the codes for Flutter Mane and Porygon2 will be.
